Reviews.Title: False information
Reviews.Author: Luisana
Reviews.Content: The description of the phone is false, they offer a 3g band of 900/2100 and then they sell a phone whit a 3g band of 850/2100 that doesn't work in my country (Venezuela), I can't return the item so they screw me.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this phone, it doesn't work at all with 3G
Reviews.Author: Yoni Tidi
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for use outside the USA, and in the country I am in they have 2 cell phone providers.This phone does not work with either one. But my partners I phone works perfect with both of the providers.I wasted my money on this phone

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: its just okay, really basic though . Its a cellphone for someone who doesn't need a lot of applications so its just okay

Reviews.Title: I love My Phone
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: It came within two weeks and I love it the sim card works and i can get on the internet just fine. Great phone works great

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Andres Chang
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work with 3g, just 2g. total waste of money. I would give 0 stars but it is not allowed

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sans
Reviews.Content: Just awesome phone, I loved this phone and at this price this is the best smart phone available in the market and thanks to amazon.

Reviews.Title: great choice
Reviews.Author: veronica diaz
Reviews.Content: my phone is beautiful and works lovely...I'm very very happy and would bye another for my family..Is a great choice.

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - GT-I8260
3G Network HSDPA 900 / 2100
Dual SIM (dual stand-by) / Android OS, v4.1.2 (Jelly Bean)
Screen Resolution 480 x 800 pixels, 4.3 inches
Memory 8 GB (4.5 GB user available), 1 GB RAM
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Core I8262 Dual-Sim 3G, 5MP, 8GB, Jelly Bean Factory Unlocked World Mobile Phone - Blue
